text:
Despacito by Luis Fonsi has been streamed a whopping 4.6 billion times and is actually the most streamed song ever.

Unfortunately, it is not likely that this will actually translate into much cash considering what an amazing achievement it is to have your song played so many times.

Now, if all these streams came on Spotify then he could earn up to $27 million, based on a royalty of $0.008 per stream, which would be at the high end.[1]

However, it is thought that 2.7 billion of these streams are on YouTube.

It is estimated that he has earned around $2.7 million for the YouTube streams.

Footnotes

[1] This is how much money Luis Fonsi made from 4.6 billion streams of ‘Despacito’
title: How much has Luis Fonsi earned with his hit "Despacito"?
